agentUtterance.text: Hi there, welcome to the Cymbal Air helpdesk! I can help you find a flight to anywhere in the world. Where would you like to go?

userUtterance.text: I want to fly to Kenya

agentUtterance.text: Which city in Kenya would you like to fly to?

userUtterance.text: Not sure, can you give me some suggestions?

agentUtterance.text: Of course! Some popular destinations in Kenya include Nairobi, the capital city, and Mombasa, a coastal city known for its beaches. Which city would you like to fly to?
Got it. Which city are you departing from?
When would you like to fly out?

agentUtterance.text: Which of these flights would you like to book? Your cheapest option is a flight that leaves PRG at 11:05 pm in the evening on October 14th, arrives in MBA at 12:35 am in the morning the following day, and costs $208.

userUtterance.text: I want to book the most expensive flight

agentUtterance.text: Excellent, your flight has been booked. Your flight departs from PRG at 4:42 PM and arrives in MBA the following day at 6:12 PM. Your booking number is A3H5YJ, you will receive an email with more details shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with?
